★★★★★ The Big Sale of Basic VPS, Premium VPS & Magento VPS plans ★★★★★

Limited offer for hostingdiscussion users until 18/02/2015:

Use THE-BIG-SALE coupon code in order to get 20% off for life for the following services:
  • SolusVM XEN VPS - All Basic VPS plans
  • Citrix Xen VPS - All Premium VPS plans
  • All Magento Virtual Private Server Hosting Plans

All our VPS plans comes with Anti-DDoS protection and game servers are welcome.

Example of our plans:

Basic VPS-100
